ResearchProjectDef.label: Breathing Gourd Crafting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to craft specialized breathing training gourds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Scarlet Iron Working
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to identify, process, and work with Scarlet Iron Ore and Scarlet Crimson Iron Sand.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Scarlet Thread Weaving
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to weave fine scarlet iron threads into fabric. This specialized textile incorporates microscopic iron particles, providing protection while remaining flexible enough for clothing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nichirin Blade
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the ability to forge Nichirin Blades from scarlet iron.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Flesh Blade
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the ability to forge Flesh Blades from scarlet iron infused with human meat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Slayer Corps Uniform
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the uniform of the Demon Slayer Corps. This specialized attire provides protection while allowing freedom of movement. Requires scarlet thread fabric.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Haoris
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the ability to craft traditional haoris.
